---
title: Create an Agent
description: Create a new workflow agent in GEP Qi Studio.
---

## Create a workflow agent

1. Open **Agents** in the left navigation.
2. Click **Create**.
3. Provide a name and description.
4. Save to open the workflow canvas.

## Create a quantum agent

If you need a lightweight agent for direct LLM interactions, create a quantum agent and configure instructions, tools, and model settings.
